english.segment1: Almighty God my Redeemer, my hiding place, my strong refuge. No other name like Jesus, no power can stand against you. My feet are planted on this rock and I will not be shaken. My hope it comes from you alone, my Rock and my Salvation. Your praise is always on my lips, your Word is living in my heart. And I will praise you with a new song, my soul will bless you Lord
english.segment2: You fill my life with greater joy, as I delight myself in you. And I will praise you with a new song, my soul will bless you Lord
english.segment3: My feet are planted on this rock and I will not be shaken. My hope it comes from you alone, my Rock and my Salvation. Your praise is always on my lips, your Word is living in my heart. And I will praise you with a new song, my soul will be bless you Lord
english.segment4: You fill my life with greater joy, as I delight myself in you. And I will praise you with a new song, my soul will bless you Lord
english.segment5: When I am weak you make me strong, When I'm poor, I know I'm rich for in the power of your name. All things are possible, all things are possible
english.segment6: Your praise is always on my lips, your Word is living in my heart. And I will praise you with a new song, my soul will be bless you Lord
english.segment7: You fill my life with greater joy, as I delight myself in you. And I will praise you with a new song, my soul will bless you Lord
english.segment8: When I am weak you make me strong, When I'm poor, I know I'm rich for in the power of your name. All things are possible, all things are possible (..till fade)
